query: In prospectus_sp500 (SPDR S&P 500 ETF Trust), what is the Trust’s investment objective?
In prospectus_gold (SPDR Gold Trust), what is the Trust’s investment objective?
In prospectus_sdpr (State Street SPDR Portfolio TIPS ETF), what is the Fund’s investment objective?
In factsheet_sp500 (SPDR S&P 500 ETF Trust), what is the fund’s stated objective (as described in the fact sheet)?
In factsheet_gold (SPDR Gold Trust), what is the fund’s stated objective (as described in the fact sheet)?
In prospectus_sdpr (State Street SPDR Portfolio TIPS ETF), what are the annual fund operating expenses (management fee and total expense ratio)?
In prospectus_sp500 (SPDR S&P 500 ETF Trust), what fees/expenses are described (expense ratio or other recurring costs)?
In prospectus_gold (SPDR Gold Trust), what fees/expenses are described (trust expenses or sponsor fee)?
In factsheet_sdpr (State Street SPDR Portfolio ETF), what is the stated net expense ratio or management fee on the fact sheet?
In factsheet_sp500 (SPDR S&P 500 ETF Trust), what is the stated expense ratio on the fact sheet?
In prospectus_sp500 (SPDR S&P 500 ETF Trust), what is the Passive Strategy/Index Risk described for the Trust?
In prospectus_sdpr (State Street SPDR Portfolio family prospectus), what does it say under “PRINCIPAL RISKS OF INVESTING IN THE FUND” about Market Risk?
In prospectus_sdpr (State Street SPDR Portfolio family prospectus), name 3 principal risks listed for one of the funds (as explicitly listed in the prospectus).
In prospectus_gold (SPDR Gold Trust), what are the principal risks of investing in the Trust?
In factsheet_gold (SPDR Gold Trust), does the fact sheet list key risks? If so, summarize them.
In prospectus_sp500 (SPDR S&P 500 ETF Trust), define “Unit Investment Trust” (if the prospectus defines it).
In prospectus_sdpr, define “inception date” (a definition, not a ‘since inception’ performance label).
In prospectus_gold (SPDR Gold Trust), define how “NAV” is described/defined (if explicitly defined).
In factsheet_sp500 (SPDR S&P 500 ETF Trust), what does it say about tracking error (if anything)?
In factsheet_sdpr, define “duration” (if the fact sheet defines it; otherwise refuse).
In prospectus_sdpr (State Street SPDR Portfolio TIPS ETF), what performance information is provided (e.g., average annual total returns or since inception returns) and what time period is covered?
In prospectus_sp500 (SPDR S&P 500 ETF Trust), does it provide performance history or returns? If not, refuse.
In factsheet_sp500 (SPDR S&P 500 ETF Trust), what performance period returns are shown (e.g., 1Y/3Y/5Y) and what are they?
In factsheet_sdpr, what performance period returns are shown (e.g., YTD/1Y/3Y) and what are they?
In factsheet_gold (SPDR Gold Trust), what performance period returns are shown and what are they?
In prospectus_sdpr (State Street SPDR Portfolio family prospectus), what does it say about changing a fund’s investment objective without shareholder approval (if stated)?
In prospectus_sp500 (SPDR S&P 500 ETF Trust), summarize the “Passive Strategy/Index Risk” in 1–2 sentences.
In prospectus_gold (SPDR Gold Trust), does the Trust hold physical gold bullion or use derivatives (as described)?
In factsheet_sp500 (SPDR S&P 500 ETF Trust), what is the ticker symbol (if listed on the fact sheet)?
In factsheet_gold (SPDR Gold Trust), what is the ticker symbol (if listed on the fact sheet)?
